data.title: Beyond Good & Evil News - Push Square
data.text:
Review Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition (PS5) - Cult Classic's Remaster Nearly Picture Perfect

Bravo, Yade

It’s strange to think that Beyond Good & Evil was a failure on release. It was critically well-received but sales were poor, and it took years to gain a cult following. Now, it’s revered as a masterpiece, gathering a devoted fan base that still pines for the sequel that’s all but passed into legend. Developed by Ubisoft...

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 2 Is Still in Development, Ubisoft Assures

And that's that

Beyond Good & Evil 2 remains in development at Ubisoft, and that's just about all the French publisher has to say on the matter. On the eve of the original game's 20th anniversary re-release, the series' official Twitter account posted a thread all about the PS5, PS4 remaster and said: "Yes, Beyond Good & Evil 2 is still in...

Ubisoft

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition Confirmed for Limited Run Games Showcase

Fancy that, a flying pig

We had a feeling Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition might rear its head soon (despite missing its anniversary year), reassured by the Trophy list that recently popped up online. Well, it's official now: Ubisoft has announced it will share news about the game during tomorrow's Limited Run Games showcase on 20th...

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition Release Seems Imminent on PS5

Even further beyond

Remember when Ubisoft announced Beyond Good & Evil: 20th Anniversary Edition last year after the whole thing was leaked? Well, the publisher said we'd hear more about the remaster in 2024, but it's been silent on the matter ever since. However, the title has now reappeared via a newly discovered Trophy list, which can be...

Ubisoft

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 2 Seemingly Vapourware After Another No-Show at Ubisoft Forward

Put us out of our misery

We aren't sure who is holding out hope for Beyond Good & Evil 2 at this point; in 2022, we brought you the news that the game had taken the dubious honour of being in development for longer than literally any game ever, at 16 (now 18) years. Another Ubisoft Forward showcase has been and gone, and still no word. As

Ubisoft

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition Announced

It will "honour the legacy of the original"

Update: Following the leaks overnight, Ubisoft has now confirmed Beyond Good & Evil: 20th Anniversary Edition is indeed in development. More news will be shared in early 2024, but the publisher is "dedicated to making it an experience that truly honors the legacy of the original". Ubisoft says the...

Ubisoft

PS5

PS4

Beyond Good & Evil

News Iconic PS2 Platformer Beyond Good & Evil Appears to Be Coming to PS5

20th anniversary edition awaits

It looks like an updated version of Ubisoft’s iconic PS2 era platformer Beyond Good & Evil could be coming to the PS5, as a listing for a 20th Anniversary Edition has been uncovered on the US ratings board website, the ESRB. While the game hasn’t been officially announced by the French publisher, it’s rare...

Ubisoft

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 2 Has Been in Development Longer Than Literally Any Game, Ever

With no hint of a release date in sight

Beyond Good & Evil 2 has officially been in development longer than any other game, ever, overtaking previous Guinness World Record holder Duke Nukem Forever (in the category of longest development period for a video game) for that particular dubious honour.

Ubisoft

PS5

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good & Evil 2 Just Found Its New Lead Writer

15 years after it was first announced

Beyond Good & Evil 2 has been a long time coming and is apparently still a long way off. At this point, it's kind of hard to believe this thing is ever coming out. We did get some movement today, though, with the reveal that the project has found a new lead writer. Sarah Arellano announced yesterday in a...

Ubisoft

PS5

PS4

Beyond Good & Evil

News So, Beyond Good & Evil 2 Is Probably Never Happening

Project still in pre-production

Remember Beyond Good & Evil 2? Remember the swearing monkey? Remember when it was meant to be getting a beta in 2019? Well, to put it bluntly, we wouldn't get your hopes up for this thing ever releasing. As if it wasn't already obvious, Beyond Good & Evil 2 is probably in serious development hell — and a new...

News Ubisoft: Beyond Good & Evil 2 Development Going Well, Gameplay Coming Next Year

A rare update

Ubisoft has decided to release a statement on Beyond Good & Evil 2, following the news that Michel Ancel — one of the game's original creative leads — is retiring from the industry. It's been a long time since we've seen anything of the project, and it's been in development for years now. But, according to Ubisoft, that...

Beyond Good & Evil

News Beyond Good and Evil 2 Looks Ambitious and Massive in New Gameplay Video

The planetary system is your oyster

Beyond Good & Evil 2 still seems so far off, doesn't it? The project does seem to be making some progress, however, as Ubisoft recently held a live stream in which it went over the current state of the game. If you don't have an hour to spare, the publisher has pieced together an abridged version that hits all...

News Michel Ancel Aiming For a Beyond Good & Evil 2 Beta 'End of Next Year'

Beta late than never

Beyond Good & Evil 2 is fast becoming the new The Last Guardian. We've seen some brilliant trailers for the game, and some impressive-looking footage from early tech demos, but it remains an enigma. We're no closer to a release date,

E3 2018 Development Still Hasn't Really Started on Beyond Good & Evil 2

Ubisoft wants your help to finish (start) it

Ubisoft once again showed off the highly-anticipated Beyond Good & Evil 2 during its E3 2018 press conference. We learned more about the prequel's plot and characters, but very little about the actual release date – which we're gagging for at this point. We did see pre-alpha footage of one of...

News Beyond Good & Evil 2 Appears to Be Making Some Progress

But not much

It’s been a year since Beyond Good & Evil 2 was announced, and here are some Ubisoft employees talking about it in thick French accents. This is all still very much work in progress stuff, and frankly it doesn’t look like it’s come that far since E3 2017, but that’s to be expected from a title that will never come out. Okay,...

News This Beyond Good & Evil 2 Gameplay Proves It's a Real Thing

Ubisoft shows 15 mins of footage

Good news everyone, Beyond Good & Evil 2 isn't just a CG trailer. The project may still be very early in development, but Ubisoft does have a playable prototype of the game, which was apparently shown behind closed doors at E3 2017. You can catch 15 minutes of it above. It's clear that a lot of what's on display...

News Is Long Awaited Sequel Beyond Good & Evil 2 Back On?

Turn the Pey'j

Beyond Good & Evil 2 seems to have been in the pipeline for an eternity, and now Ubisoft veteran Michel Ancel has hinted that the project may be back on. The Wild Sheep Studio founder – who's also working with Sony on the fascinating PlayStation 4 exclusive WiLD – posted a most interesting picture on Instagram today: concept...

Rumour Beyond Good & Evil 2 Is Dead and Buried

Yves forbade Jade

Sony's big E3 2015 press conference may have felt a little like a séance for formerly dead projects, but there's one title that it failed to resurrect: Beyond Good & Evil 2. The astute among you may have noticed that the release was absent from Ubisoft's media briefing, and that's because it's apparently dead as a dodo –...
